content:
Craft an item of type: jungle_fence
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 60, "index": 13}, {"type": "lime_concrete", "quantity": 15, "index": 17}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 21, "index": 36}, {"type": "gold_block", "quantity": 56, "index": 39}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}]

thought: To craft a jungle_fence, I need to craft jungle_planks, which requires placing a stripped_jungle_log into the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move the stripped_jungle_log from slot 41 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: jungle_fence
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 60, "index": 13}, {"type": "lime_concrete", "quantity": 15, "index": 17}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 21, "index": 36}, {"type": "gold_block", "quantity": 56, "index": 39}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the jungle_planks, I will move them out of the crafting grid and into a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: jungle_fence
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 60, "index": 13}, {"type": "lime_concrete", "quantity": 15, "index": 17}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 21, "index": 36}, {"type": "gold_block", "quantity": 56, "index": 39}]

thought: I have all the required ingredients to craft a jungle fence. First I need to place one jungle plank in the top left corner of the crafting table. This is slot 1. Therefore I will move one plank from slot 12 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: jungle_fence
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 12}, {"type": "cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 60, "index": 13}, {"type": "lime_concrete", "quantity": 15, "index": 17}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 21, "index": 36}, {"type": "gold_block", "quantity": 56, "index": 39}]
thought: Next I need to place a stick in the middle of the top row. The middle of the top row is slot 2. Therefore I will move a stick from slot 11 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: jungle_fence
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 12}, {"type": "cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 60, "index": 13}, {"type": "lime_concrete", "quantity": 15, "index": 17}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 21, "index": 36}, {"type": "gold_block", "quantity": 56, "index": 39}]
thought: Next I need to place a jungle plank on the right side of the top row. This is slot 3. Therefore I will move a jungle plank from slot 12 to slot 3.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 3 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: jungle_fence
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 12}, {"type": "cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 60, "index": 13}, {"type": "lime_concrete", "quantity": 15, "index": 17}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 21, "index": 36}, {"type": "gold_block", "quantity": 56, "index": 39}]
thought: Next I need to place a jungle plank in the center of the left column. This is slot 4. Therefore I will move a jungle plank from slot 12 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Ok

inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 60, "index": 13}, {"type": "lime_concrete", "quantity": 15, "index": 17}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 21, "index": 36}, {"type": "gold_block", "quantity": 56, "index": 39}]

Craft an item of type: jungle_fence
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_fence", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 60, "index": 13}, {"type": "lime_concrete", "quantity": 15, "index": 17}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 21, "index": 36}, {"type": "gold_block", "quantity": 56, "index": 39}]
thought: Finally I need to move the crafted jungle fences from the crafting slot (0) to an empty inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 3
